meter_reading.notes: Odometer reading of 2271.0 is clear. The red needle is positioned between 0.04 and 0.05 marks. Visually, it is past the halfway point towards 0.05 (~0.046). Per instructions to interpolate to 0.01 resolution and choose the closest value, 0.05 is selected. The needle angle reflects its actual physical position, approximately 65% of the way from the 0.04 mark (180 degrees) to the 0.05 mark (225 degrees).
